trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> for visually picking a color.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>直观地选择一种颜色。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor"></xref> class.
Edits the given object value using the editor style provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor.GetEditStyle*> method.
trans-unit.target: 编辑使用提供的编辑器样式的给定的对象值<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor.GetEditStyle*>方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: 提供的服务提供程序，以便可以获取任何所需的编辑服务。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>可以用于获取附加上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
The new value of the object.
If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未更改对象的值，这应返回同一对象传递给它。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style of the Edit method.
trans-unit.target: 获取编辑方法的编辑样式。

trans-unit.source: If the method is not supported, this will return <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持的方法，这将返回<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>可以用于获取附加上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: An enum value indicating the provided editing style.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值，该值指示所提供的编辑样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if this editor supports the painting of a representation of an object's value.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该编辑器是否支持绘制对象的值的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>可以用于获取附加上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor.PaintValue*> is implemented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor.PaintValue*>实现; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ColorEditor.PaintValue*>

trans-unit.source: Paints a representative value of the given object to the provided canvas.
trans-unit.target: 绘制给定对象提供的画布上一个代表性值。

trans-unit.source: Painting should be done within the boundaries of the provided rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 提供的矩形的边界内应进行绘制。

trans-unit.source: What to paint and where to paint it.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的内容和绘制其位置。
